1.0.name: wordpress/cssigniter-shortcodes
1.0.description: This shortcodes plugin, has been created to complement and be used mainly with CSSIgniter's premium and free themes. But of course, anyone can use it with any theme. A lot of useful shortcodes are defined. See the plugin's homepage for a complete guide. And keep in mind that the plugin supports themes. If you don't like the colors, layout, etc, you can easily create you own shortcodes theme using CSS. And don't forget to share your theme with us, so everyone can benefit and see your skills.
